item.title: About
item.description:
I am a Android develop engineering-in-training that like making things and learning things.

Education

  • 2012 BASc, Department of Electricity and Technology, University of Science and Technology of China.

Skill

  • Android Application development.
  • Circuit Analysis.
  • Basic VHDL programming.

Hobby

  • Learn new things about program.
  • Develop Android App for my own phone.
  • Sports like running, ping-pong, basketball.
  • Paint, handmade crafts and so on.
